title: Process multiple media files in Telegram with Gemini AI & PostgreSQL database
description:
# ü§ñüì® Telegram AI Assistant with Multi-File Media Group Handling, Smart File Processing & PostgreSQL Integration

> **AI-powered Telegram bot for text, voice, video, documents & media ‚Äî with database-driven grouping and Telegram-safe formatting.**

---

## üìã Description

This n8n template creates a **next-generation Telegram AI assistant** üß†üí¨ capable of handling **text messages, media files, and documents** with advanced processing, PostgreSQL integration, and AI-powered responses.

It is designed to **solve Telegram‚Äôs media group challenge** üì¶ ‚Äî when multiple files are sent together, they are stored, processed, and combined into one coherent AI-generated reply.

### ‚ú® Key Features
- üìÇ **Multi-file media group management** with PostgreSQL:
  - `media_group`
  - `media_queue`
  - `chat_histories`
- üìë **Document parsing** for CSV, HTML, ICS, JSON, ODS, PDF (with AI fallback), RTF, TXT, XML, and spreadsheets.
- üé§ **Voice & video transcription** for AI analysis.
- üñºÔ∏è **Image, audio, and video description** for richer AI context.
- üõ°Ô∏è **Telegram-safe MarkdownV2 formatting** with auto-splitting for messages over 4096 chars.
- ‚ö†Ô∏è **Error fallback** for unsupported file types.

---

## üí° Acknowledgment

A huge thank you to **Ezema Gingsley Chibuzo** üôå for the inspiration of the first version of this workflow:  
[Create a Multi-Modal Telegram Support Bot with GPT-4 and Supabase RAG](https://n8n.io/workflows/5589-create-a-multi-modal-telegram-support-bot-with-gpt-4-and-supabase-rag/)  
Your pioneering work laid the foundation for this improved, **database-powered multi-modal assistant** üöÄ

---

## üè∑ Tags
`telegram` `ai-assistant` `postgresql` `multi-file` `media-group`  
`file-processing` `voice-transcription` `document-parser` `pdf-extraction`  
`markdown-formatting` `n8n-template`

---

## üíº Use Case
Use this template if you need an AI-powered Telegram bot that can:
- üì¶ Handle **multiple files sent in a single message** (albums, multiple PDFs, etc.).
- üßæ Extract & analyze **content from many file formats**.
- üéôÔ∏è Transcribe **voice and video messages**.
- üóÇÔ∏è Maintain **chat memory** for contextual AI answers.
- üõ°Ô∏è Avoid **Telegram formatting errors** and length limit issues.

This workflow automates the full chain: **Receive ‚Üí Process ‚Üí AI Analysis ‚Üí Telegram-safe Reply**.

---

## üí¨ Example User Interactions

- **üìÑ Multiple PDFs with a caption** ‚Üí AI extracts and summarizes all PDFs in one combined reply.  
- **üé§ Voice message** ‚Üí AI transcribes and replies with a contextual answer.  
- **üìä CSV or spreadsheet file** ‚Üí AI parses and summarizes the data.  
- **üñºÔ∏è Multiple images** ‚Üí AI describes each image and replies in a single message.

---

## üîë Required Credentials
- **Telegram Bot API** (Bot Token)  
- **PostgreSQL** (Connection credentials)  
- **AI Provider API** (OpenAI, Google Gemini, or compatible LLM)

---

## ‚öôÔ∏è Setup Instructions
1. üóÑÔ∏è **Create the PostgreSQL tables** (Gray section SQL):
   - `media_group`
   - `media_queue`
   - `chat_histories`
2. üîå Configure the **Telegram Trigger** with your bot token.
3. ü§ñ Connect your **AI provider** credentials.
4. üóÇÔ∏è Set up **PostgreSQL** credentials in the database nodes.
5. ‚ñ∂Ô∏è Deploy the workflow in n8n.
6. üéØ Start sending messages and files to your bot.

---

## üìå Extra Notes
- ‚úÖ **Green section** ensures only one trigger per media group.  
- üìå **Yellow section** guarantees captions and files are stored in the correct sequence.  
- ‚ú® **Purple section** formats AI output to be Telegram-safe and split if needed.  
- üß† AI prompt is **not fixed**, allowing full customization.

---

## üí° Need Assistance?

If you‚Äôd like help customizing or extending this workflow, feel free to reach out:  

üìß Email: [johnsilva11031@gmail.com](mailto:johnsilva11031@gmail.com)  
üîó LinkedIn: [John Alejandro Silva Rodr√≠guez](https://www.linkedin.com/in/john-alejandro-silva-rodriguez-48093526b/)
disclaimer: This workflow is provided as-is. Please review and test before using in production.
